title: Microsoft L61 compensation
content:
Education: Tier-3 college, Not from IIT, NIT, IIIT's
Years of Experience: 1 year 11 month as Full time + 6 month intern in same team
Prior Experience: Amazon 
Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE2 - L61
Location: Bangalore
Base salary: 30 Lakhs INR
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 60000 USD vested 25% each year for 4 year ~ 12.45L per year
Bonus: 0% to 20% per year of Base salary
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): (30L + 3L@10% + 12.45L) ~ 45.45L per year
Benefits: Standard perks + Too many perks for MS employee
Other details: Trying to negotiate

**Am I low balled, I see that most of the folks for L61 roles are getting more than 70k USD stocks and also sign-on and relocation bonus?**

P.S- Will be promoting to SDE2 at Amazon in Q4
yoe: 1 Year 11 Month As Full Time + 6 Month Intern In Same Team

title: PhonePe Software Engineer Compensation
content:
Education: B.Tech from a Tier 2 College
YOE: 10 months FTE + 6 months Intern
Prior Experience: Software Developer at a Unicorn StartUp
Date of Offer: June 2024
Company: Phonepe
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 23,00,000 INR
Signing Bonus: 2,00,000
Stock bonus: 18.5 Lacs stock grant vested over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Benefits): ~30 LPA for first year
Benefits: Standard Phonepe Benefits.

Other details: Accepted this offer!

title: Paypal | SDE-2 | Chennai
content:
Education: Tier 3
Previous Company : Indian Unicorn
Previous CTC: 14 LPA (12 Fixed + 2 Variable)
Years of Experience: 2.5 yrs

Company: Paypal
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Chennai
Fixed Salary: 20L INR
Stock bonus: 19,000 $ divided across 3 yrs (33%, 33%, 33%)
Bonus: 10% of Fixed Salary (2L INR)
Total comp = 38 LPA (27 LPA for first year)
Benefits: Standard Paypal benefits

Note : Dont have any other offers in hand.

Please suggest your views on this offer.
